ajjeva.summary: (sandhi) this very day; just today; right now [ajja + eva] sandhi, adv + ind

gantuṁ.summary: (inf) to go (to); to travel (to) [√gam + tuṁ] inf of gacchati

(opt) could know; must understand [jānā + eyya], [jāneyya > jaññā] opt of jānāti, irreg
(adj) lovely; precious; fine [√jan + ya] adj, from jāyati
(opt) may know; could understand [jānā + eyya > iyā] opt of jānāti, irreg

yaṁ.summary: (pron) which; whoever; whatever; that which [ya + aṁ] pron, nt nom sg of ya
(pron) whoever; whatever; that which [ya + aṁ] pron, masc fem & nt acc sg of ya
(ind) because; because of; since; when [ya + aṁ] ind, adv, acc sg of ya
(letter) (gram) letter y; 34th letter of the alphabet; palatal semi-vowel letter, masc
(cs) (gram) ya; suffix used to form impersonal and passive verbs cs, masc
(cs) (gram) ya; conjugational sign of group 3 divādigaṇa verbs cs, masc
